name: Create Stage Instance
description: Requires the user to be a moderator of the Stage channel.

params.name: channel_id
params.description: The id of the Stage channel

params.name: topic
params.description: The topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)

params.name: privacy_level?
params.description: The [privacy level](#DOCS_RESOURCES_STAGE_INSTANCE/stage-instance-object-privacy-level) of the Stage instance (default GUILD_ONLY)

name: Get Stage Instance
description: Gets the stage instance associated with the Stage channel, if it exists.

name: Modify Stage Instance
description: Requires the user to be a moderator of the Stage channel.

params.name: topic?
params.description: The topic of the Stage instance (1-120 characters)
